library(IEAnalyzeR)
library(tidyverse)
library(gt)

devtools::install_git("https://github.com/Gulf-IEA/IEAnalyzeR")

HUMAN DIMENSION BLURB

# Status & Trends Summary

```{r}
table<-create_trend_table("../data/humandimensions/", include_gt = F)


table$sec_titles<-c(rep("#commercial-fishing",3),
              rep("#google-trends", 2),
              rep("#housing-tenure", 4),
              rep("#public-engagements",1),
              rep("#recreational-effort",1))


# table$Indicator<-paste0("<a href='#energy-prices'>Commercial Landings</a>")
table$Indicator<-paste0("<a href=",table$sec_titles,">",table$Indicator,"</a>")
# table$sec_titles<-NULL

table %>%  gt() %>% 
  fmt_markdown(columns = "Indicator") %>% 
  gtExtras::gt_theme_pff() %>%
  tab_style(style = list(cell_fill(color="#1A2954")),
            locations = cells_column_labels(everything())) %>%  
  cols_hide(columns = c("sec_titles",
                        "Mean",
                        "SD"))


```
